Articles.Content: Whenever I go past 14,000 m in any spaceship my kerbals die. The log says they just die! I have no idea whats going on, am I going too fast? No oxygen? What? Or is this a bug? Help!

Can you give us a few more details on what exactly the ship is doing when this happens?

Are you playing on a stock install, or are you using a few mods as well?

Oxygen is not a concern in KSP so far, and speed won't kill Kerbals as long as you're not slamming them into solid objects at high speeds. Your problem is very unusual, so you'll need to offer some more details.

A screenshot of the F3 log might be useful, along with a screenshot of your ship on the launchpad... and let us know if you're using any mods.

=Smidge=

It sounds very much like you have a mod that kills them off for some reason.

There is no way vanilla KSP can kill a kerbal without a crash.
next time you run the mission have your debug menu up and when your kerbals die cheack it.
